page.title: 13The Camps Petrol Station
page.content: The Camps petrol station is situated by the Service bridge in the camps part of town. It has two petrol pumps and though the building covers an extremely small area it sells all the basic things needed for car maintainance. The garage employs two people, Joan and an old man. They work on shifts, the old man from 9am to 4pm and Joan 4pm to 8pm. It averages about 7 customers per hour. The station does not get much customers on a Monday but trade gets good at the end of a working week, Thursday and Friday. Round about Spring and Summer it is not unusual to see people buying a gallon of petrol in a can for lawn mowers. Other things that can be obtained from the camps are basics such as oil, electrical goods and car cleaning equipment.
